columns.Description: Unique identifier for the device in the service
columns.Name: DeviceId

columns.Description: Version number of the software product
columns.Name: SoftwareVersion

columns.Description: Registry paths on which evidence indicating the existence of a software on a device was detected
columns.Name: RegistryPaths

columns.Description: Disk paths on which file level evidence indicating the existence of a software on a device was detected
columns.Name: DiskPaths

columns.Description: Date and time when the service last saw the device
columns.Name: LastSeenTime
